# Statement of Work
## Security Assessment Services

**Agreement Date:** [DATE]  
**Client:** [CLIENT COMPANY NAME] ("Client")  
**Provider:** [YOUR NAME / COMPANY] ("Provider")

---

## 1. Project Overview

Provider will conduct a security assessment of Client's web application infrastructure as described in this Statement of Work.

---

## 2. Scope of Services

### 2.1 In-Scope Assets

The following assets are authorized for testing:

| Asset | Type | URL/IP | Notes |
|-------|------|--------|-------|
| [Primary App] | Web Application | https://example.com | Production |
| [API] | REST API | https://api.example.com | v2 endpoints |
| [Admin] | Admin Panel | https://admin.example.com | Internal |

### 2.2 Testing Types

Provider will perform the following testing:

- [x] Automated vulnerability scanning
- [x] Manual validation of findings
- [x] Business logic testing
- [x] Authentication/authorization testing
- [x] API security testing
- [ ] Mobile application testing (if applicable)

### 2.3 Out-of-Scope

The following are explicitly excluded:

- Denial of Service (DoS/DDoS) attacks
- Social engineering of employees
- Physical security testing
- Third-party services (unless explicitly listed above)
- Production database modification
- [Other exclusions]

### 2.4 Testing Boundaries

- **Rate Limiting:** Maximum [10] requests per second
- **Testing Hours:** [Business hours only / 24x7]
- **Notification:** Provider will notify Client before starting
- **Emergency Stop:** Client can halt testing at any time

---

## 3. Deliverables

| Deliverable | Format | Description |
|-------------|--------|-------------|
| Executive Summary | PDF | High-level risk overview for leadership |
| Technical Report | PDF | Detailed findings with PoCs |
| Raw Findings | JSON | Machine-readable for integration |
| Findings Call | Video | 1-hour walkthrough of findings |

---

## 4. Timeline

| Milestone | Date | Description |
|-----------|------|-------------|
| Project Kickoff | [DATE] | Scope confirmation, access setup |
| Assessment Start | [DATE] | Begin security testing |
| Assessment Complete | [DATE] | Testing concluded |
| Draft Report | [DATE] | Initial findings delivered |
| Final Report | [DATE] | Final deliverables |
| Findings Review | [DATE] | Walkthrough call |

**Total Duration:** [5] business days

---

## 5. Client Responsibilities

Client agrees to:

1. **Provide written authorization** before testing begins
2. **Designate a point of contact** for communications
3. **Provide access credentials** if authenticated testing required
4. **Respond to queries** within 24 business hours
5. **Not make significant changes** to in-scope assets during testing
6. **Have emergency contact available** during testing hours

### 5.1 Point of Contact

| Role | Name | Email | Phone |
|------|------|-------|-------|
| Primary Contact | [NAME] | [EMAIL] | [PHONE] |
| Technical Contact | [NAME] | [EMAIL] | [PHONE] |
| Emergency Contact | [NAME] | [EMAIL] | [PHONE] |

---

## 6. Provider Responsibilities

Provider agrees to:

1. Conduct testing within authorized scope only
2. Maintain confidentiality of all findings
3. Report critical vulnerabilities immediately upon discovery
4. Complete testing within agreed timeline
5. Provide professional, actionable reports
6. Validate findings before reporting

---

## 7. Pricing and Payment

### 7.1 Fees

| Service | Amount |
|---------|--------|
| Security Assessment | $[AMOUNT] |

### 7.2 Payment Schedule

| Milestone | Amount | Due Date |
|-----------|--------|----------|
| Upon SOW signing | $[50%] | [DATE] |
| Upon final delivery | $[50%] | [DATE] |

### 7.3 Payment Terms

- Net 15 days from invoice date
- Late payments accrue 1.5% monthly interest
- All amounts in USD

---

## 8. Confidentiality

### 8.1 Provider Confidentiality

Provider will:
- Keep all findings strictly confidential
- Not disclose vulnerabilities to third parties
- Securely delete all Client data within 30 days of project completion
- Not use Client's name as reference without written permission

### 8.2 Report Ownership

- Client owns all deliverables upon payment
- Provider retains no copies after secure deletion
- Client may share internally without restriction

---

## 9. Liability

### 9.1 Limitation of Liability

Provider's total liability is limited to fees paid under this SOW.

### 9.2 Exclusions

Provider is not liable for:
- Issues caused by Client's own changes during testing
- Pre-existing vulnerabilities
- Third-party actions
- Consequential damages

### 9.3 Authorization

Client confirms:
- Authority to authorize testing on all in-scope assets
- No third-party assets are included without authorization
- Provider is indemnified for authorized testing activities

---

## 10. Termination

Either party may terminate with 5 business days written notice.

Upon termination:
- Client pays for work completed
- Provider delivers partial findings (if applicable)
- Confidentiality obligations continue
